files.patch:
@@ -44,1 +44,0 @@ -import java.util.ResourceBundle; @@ -117,1 +116,1 @@ - * Note: {@code CollationKey}s from different + * @apiNote {@code CollationKey}s from different @@ -121,0 +120,12 @@ + * @implNote Implementations of {@code Collator} class may produce + * different instances based on the "{@code co}" + * + * Unicode collation identifier in the specified {@code Locale}. + * For example: + *
+ * {@snippet lang = java: + * Collator.getInstance(Locale.forLanguageTag("sv-u-co-trad")); + * } + *
+ * may return a {@code Collator} instance with the traditional sorting, which + * gives 'v' and 'w' the same sorting order.

@@ -57,0 +57,10 @@
+            },
+            {"Rule.trad",
+                "& Z < a\u030a , A\u030a" +  // a-ring, aa ligaure
+                "< a\u0308 , A\u0308 < a\u030b, A\u030b " +  // a-umlaut, a-double-acute
+                "< \u00e6 , \u00c6 " +                   //  ae ligature
+                "< o\u0308 , O\u0308 " +   // o-umlaut
+                "< o\u030b , O\u030b ; \u00f8 , \u00d8 " +   // o-double-acute < o-stroke
+                "& V ; w , W" +
+                "& Y, u\u0308 , U\u0308" + // u-double-acute
+                "; u\u030b, U\u030b "
